item.title: 卢拉寻求在巴西二十国集团会议期间牵头推动制定全球人工智能规则
item.description: 在全球最大的经济体努力就人工智能的未来达成共识之际，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦希望确保发展中国家不会被排除在这场辩论之外。【原文：As the planet’s largest economies struggle to forge consensus on the future of artificial intelligence, Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva wants to ensure the developing world isn’t left out of the debate.】

item.title: 交易员需要一本新的股市游戏手册来应对降息
item.description: 由于美联储开始降息，华尔街交易员在股市下注时面临着独特的挑战：历史不再是指南。【原文：Wall Street traders have a unique challenge in placing bets on the stock market now that the Federal Reserve has started cutting interest rates: History is no longer a guide.】

item.title: 埃及在推动资产出售的同时出让联合银行股份
item.description: 埃及中央银行周日在一份声明中表示，埃及将出售国有联合银行的股份，因为政府正在推进一项公共资产出售计划，该计划是引入外国投资者努力的一部分。【原文：Egypt will offer a stake in state-held United Bank, the central bank said in a statement Sunday, as the government pushes ahead with a public asset sale program that’s part of an effort to bring in foreign investors.】

item.title: 苹果新款 iPhone 16 反映出创新步伐放缓
item.description: 新款 iPhone 在摄像头方面的改进非常诱人，但该设备是苹果公司硬件创新步伐放缓的象征。此外：该公司正在准备 iOS 18 到明年的一系列更新；一种令人眼花缭乱的全新 Apple Watch 配置仍未面世；iOS 18.1 的最新测试版已经发布。【原文：The new iPhone has tantalizing camera improvements, but the device is emblematic of Apple’s slower pace of hardware innovation. Also: The company is preparing a slew of updates to iOS 18 through next year; one dazzling new Apple Watch configuration remains elusive; and the latest beta version of iOS 18.1 arrives.】

item.title: 交易员根据不同的利率路径选择拉美赌注
item.description: 在美联储四年来首次降息之后，拉美地区最大的经济体走上了截然相反的道路，资金经理们正在将拉美资产对立起来，寻找赢家。【原文：Money managers are pitting Latin American assets against each other, hunting for winners as the region’s largest economies take opposite paths in the wake of the Federal Reserve’s first interest-rate cut in four years.】

item.title: 意大利，Asterion 出价收购意大利电信旗下 Sparkle 部门
item.description: 据《共和国报》报道，意大利正准备与西班牙投资公司 Asterion Industrial Partners 组成财团，竞购意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）的海底电缆部门 Sparkle。【原文：Italy is preparing a bid to buy Telecom Italia SpA’s submarine cables unit Sparkle in a consortium with Spanish investment firm Asterion Industrial Partners, according to a La Repubblica report.】

item.title: 瑞士选民否决政府的养老基金改革方案
item.description: 瑞士选民否决了政府改革公司养老基金的计划，这是今年第二次在全民公决中否决使国家退休制度适应人口结构变化的提案。【原文：Swiss voters rebuffed a government plan to reform company pension funds, marking the second time this year that a proposal to adapt the country’s retirement system to changed demographics was rejected in a plebiscite.】

item.title: 文件称瑞士信贷收购案是瑞士监管机构的调查重点
item.description: 据《SonntagsZeitung》报道，瑞士银行业监管机构正在调查瑞士信贷作为一家独立银行的最后 15 个月及其被瑞银集团拯救的过程。【原文：Switzerland’s banking regulator is investigating the final 15 months of Credit Suisse as an independent bank and its rescue by UBS Group AG, according to SonntagsZeitung.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行考虑采取更多措施保护货币
item.description: 津巴布韦央行行长约翰-穆沙亚万胡说，他将考虑动用国家储备来保护金银支持的货币，以防市场出现严重混乱。【原文：Zimbabwe’s central bank governor John Mushayavanhu said he will consider using the country’s reserves to protect the bullion-backed currency against severe market disruptions.】

item.title: 意大利考虑要求一次性支付银行利润：Corriere
item.description: Corriere della Sera 周日报道称，意大利正在考虑要求银行根据过去两年公布的盈利情况象征性地缴款。【原文：Italy is considering asking banks for a symbolic contribution calculated from earnings posted in the last two years, Corriere della Sera reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 造币厂称印度要求亚马逊和 Flipkart 提供财务数据以应对潜在处罚
item.description: 印度竞争委员会要求亚马逊卖家服务公司（Amazon Seller Services）和 Flipkart 互联网公司（Flipkart Internet）共享财务报表，以便在一起正在进行的反垄断案件中确定可能的处罚。【原文：The Competition Commission of India asked Amazon Seller Services and Flipkart Internet to share financial statements to determine a potential penalty in an ongoing antitrust case, Mint reported, citing two people aware of the development.】

item.title: 沃达丰 Idea 与诺基亚、三星签订价值 36 亿美元的网络协议
item.description: 沃达丰 Idea 有限公司与包括诺基亚在内的多家公司签订了价值 36 亿美元的合同，为这家印度电话运营商的网络升级计划提供设备。【原文：Vodafone Idea Ltd. has signed a $3.6 billion contract with companies including Nokia Oyj for the supply of equipment to the Indian phone carrier for a planned upgrade of its network.】

item.title: 韩联社称摩根士丹利的海力士卖单面临 FSS 审查
item.description: 据韩联社援引未具名行业消息人士的话报道，摩根士丹利正面临监管审查，原因是该公司在发布降级报告之前下达了卖出 SK Hynix 公司股票的指令。【原文：Morgan Stanley is facing a regulatory review over a sell order of SK Hynix Inc. shares placed before it published a downgrade report, Yonhap News reported, citing unidentified industry sources.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长期待抗击通胀取得进展
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，他预计即将公布的数据将显示出澳大利亚在抗击通胀方面取得了令人鼓舞的进展，但他承认澳大利亚央行可能还没有准备好在本周降息。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers said he expects upcoming data to show encouraging progress in combating inflation but acknowledged the central bank may not be ready to cut interest rates this week.】

item.title: 拜登政府准备禁止使用中国汽车软件
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士表示，美国商务部计划最快于周一公布禁止中国和俄罗斯制造的联网汽车硬件和软件的拟议规则。【原文：The US Commerce Department is planning to reveal proposed rules that would ban Chinese- and Russian-made hardware and software for connected vehicles as soon as Monday, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拜登在印太领导人峰会上说，中国 "在考验我们所有人
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）在一次四国领导人峰会上说，中国正在 "考验 "美国及其在印度洋-太平洋地区的盟友。【原文：President Joe Biden was caught on a hot mic saying China is “testing” the US and its allies in the Indo-Pacific region during a Quad leaders’ summit — even as the bloc’s members in their public remarks sidestepped the idea that they are a counterweight to Chinese influence.】

item.title: 通用汽车计划裁减堪萨斯工厂三分之二的工人
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors Co.）表示，将暂时解雇堪萨斯州费尔法克斯（Fairfax）装配厂三分之二的工人，因为该厂正准备开始生产下一款雪佛兰 Bolt 车型。【原文：General Motors Co. said it will temporarily lay off two-thirds of the workers at its Fairfax assembly plant in Kansas as it prepares the facility to begin production of the next Chevrolet Bolt model.】

item.title: 反人类纸牌组织起诉 SpaceX 涉嫌非法入侵得克萨斯州
item.description: 流行派对游戏《反人类纸牌》的制造商指控埃隆-马斯克的 SpaceX 公司侵入并破坏了该公司在得克萨斯州拥有的一块空地。【原文：The maker of the popular party game Cards Against Humanity is accusing Elon Musk’s SpaceX of trespassing on and damaging a plot of vacant land the company owns in Texas.】

item.title: 美联储最青睐的物价指标被视为降息的佐证
item.description: 美联储首选的物价指标和消费者需求快照被认为证实了央行的积极降息和主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）关于经济依然强劲的观点。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s preferred price metric and a snapshot of consumer demand are seen corroborating both the central bank’s aggressive interest-rate cut and Chair Jerome Powell’s view that the economy remains strong.】

item.title: 美联储大幅减息引发估值焦虑信贷周刊
item.description: 投资者正将资金投入公司债券，风险溢价趋紧，美联储降息重燃了美国避免经济衰退的希望。【原文：Investors are pouring money into corporate bonds, risk premiums are grinding tighter, and the Federal Reserve’s interest rate cut is reigniting hopes the US will dodge a recession.】

item.title: 马克龙任命阿尔芒为法国新财政部长
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙任命安托万-阿尔芒（Antoine Armand）为财政部长，将这位 33 岁、政治经验有限的年轻人推上了一场紧迫的预算之战，他必须在维持极右翼默许支持的同时严明财政纪律，以避免政府垮台。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron appointed Antoine Armand as finance minister, thrusting a 33-year-old with limited political experience into an urgent budget battle in which he must bring fiscal discipline while maintaining tacit support from the far right to avoid government collapse.】

item.title: 哈里斯竞选团队在经济演讲前就美联储言论抨击特朗普
item.description: 副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）的竞选团队抨击唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）批评美联储四年来的首次降息，在 11 月总统大选前将焦点集中在经济问题上。【原文：Vice President Kamala Harris’ campaign blasted Donald Trump for criticizing the Federal Reserve’s first rate cut in four years, keeping the focus on jockeying over the economy before the presidential election in November.】

item.title: 据说 Rightmove 拒绝了默多克旗下 REA 的改进报价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英国房地产门户网站 Rightmove Plc 已拒绝了 REA Group Ltd. 提出的更高收购要约。【原文：UK property portal Rightmove Plc has rejected an improved takeover offer from REA Group Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非主要公路因反常降雪而关闭
item.description: 一场异常的冰雪风暴迫使连接豪登省和夸祖鲁-纳塔尔省（南非人口最多的两个省份）的南非 N3 高速公路在范里安山口关闭。【原文：An unusual snow and ice storm forced the closing of South Africa’s N3 highway at Van Reenen’s Pass, which connects Gauteng to KwaZulu-Natal, the nation’s two most populous provinces.】

item.title: 据说芯片制造商高通公司将探讨对英特尔的友好收购
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Qualcomm Inc. has approached Intel Corp. to discuss a potential acquisition of the struggling chipmaker, a person with knowledge of the matter said, raising the prospect of one of the biggest-ever M&A deals.】

item.title: 蕾切尔-里夫斯有六周时间通过新经济计划提振英国情绪
item.description: 雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）有六周的时间来制定一项计划，以解决英国濒临崩溃的公共服务问题、促进经济发展并提振低迷的国民情绪。【原文：Rachel Reeves has six weeks to come up with a plan to fix the UK’s ailing public services, deliver an economic boost and lift the dour national mood — and all without blowing up the nation’s finances.】

item.title: 欧洲洪灾使保险公司面临几十年来最严重损失的威胁
item.description: 在中欧和东欧造成破坏的致命洪灾将给包括 Powszechny Zaklad Ubezpieczen SA、维也纳保险集团股份公司和 UNIQA 保险集团股份公司在内的保险公司带来一些最严重的地区损失。【原文：Deadly floods that unleashed destruction across central and eastern Europe will generate some of the worst regional losses for insurers including Powszechny Zaklad Ubezpieczen SA, Vienna Insurance Group AG and UNIQA Insurance Group AG.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行提高部分存款准备金率
item.description: 土耳其中央银行提高了商业贷款机构需要为短期和长期里拉存款预留的准备金数额，作为加强对系统中过剩流动性进行消毒的努力的一部分。【原文：Turkey’s central bank raised the amount commercial lenders need to set aside as reserves for short- and long-term lira deposits as part of efforts to enhance its sterilization of excess liquidity in the system.】

item.title: 僵尸建筑工地让德国住房问题雪上加霜
item.description: 瓦列里-舍甫琴科（Valeriy Shevchenko）正准备搬进位于柏林高档普伦茨劳尔伯格区（Prenzlauer Berg）的一套三居室新公寓，灾难却突然降临。一年多之后，这场灾难仍在上演，成为德国住房动荡的一部分。【原文：Valeriy Shevchenko was getting ready to move into a new three-room apartment in Berlin’s upscale Prenzlauer Berg district before disaster struck. More than a year later, it’s still unfolding as part of the turmoil in German housing.】

item.title: 据 CNN Brasil 报道，X 任命代表以遵守裁决
item.description: 据 CNN Brasil 报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周五在巴西为 X 指定了一名法律代表，以遵守最高法院规定的最后期限，结束巴西对该社交媒体平台的禁令。【原文：Elon Musk appointed a legal representative for X in Brazil on Friday, seeking to comply with a deadline imposed by the Supreme Court and end a ban on the social-media platform in the country, CNN Brasil reported.】
